resources.string: There players are divided into two groups: Cats and Dogs.\n There are two phases in the game: the days and the nights.

The players get to answer questions, depending on their role (cat or dog).
 Answers are then shown to everyone and the players vote to kill someone.
 The goal of the dogs here is to find the cats, based on their answers.
 The goal of the cats is to act as if they were dogs, and try to justify their answer.
During the nights, the cats gather and vote to kill a dog.\n The game continue until one of the two teams is eliminated...
